posts.post_content: I beg to differ BrutalJim. Devout Lightcaster is like this against black and with a more powerful kill ability and no first strike as well as is also harder to splash. She is very good, but i do not think the better ETB ability justifies not having first strike, so Tividar wins in my book. He can be in the main deck against other colors, what with being a 2/2 with first strike for 3. She merely becomes sideboard fodder. Opinions may differ, but i rest my case.

posts.post_content:
@TPmanW: It's a pity he didn't show up in that Duel Deck.  
On the other hand, players would have been disappointed to see this guy taking one of the five rare slots.  
  
Maybe Wizards would have decided to reprint him as an uncommon if he wasn't a legend (which probably wouldn't show up in a duel deck anyways), although they probably don't change the rarity of a card in a duel deck in the first place...  
  
He would really have suited into *Duel Decks: Knights vs. Dragons* too well:  
He's a white knight with protection from red, and the dragon deck contained seven goblin cards in total (if you count [Fire-Belly Changeling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fire-Belly Changeling) and [Dragon Fooder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dragon Fooder).)  
  
None of these goblins are a big threat, but maybe they still considered him to be too strong there as another [Silver Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silver Knight) that could only be harmed by [Henge Guardian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Henge Guardian) and [Ghostfire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghostfire).  
I'd gladly have him seen him instead of [White Knight/a](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=White Knight/a)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

He's a white knight with protection from red, and the dragon deck contained seven goblin cards in total (if you count Fire-Belly Changeling and Dragon Fooder.)

None of these goblins are a big threat, but maybe they still considered him to be too strong there as another Silver Knight that could only be harmed by Henge Guardian and Ghostfire.
I'd gladly have him seen him instead of White Knight/a... (see all)

no reason to play this in Commander unless you really want to make a statement how racist against Goblins you are. (narrow targeted removal against a tribe that is not worth using narrow targeted hate when you can just use normal board wiping hate that also hurts non-goblin decks)
